content.description: An awesome route that starts in the center left of the wall and takes the most aesthetic line to the steepest part of the wall where it is stopped short. Clip the anchors and traverse left to finish on the Bermuda Triangle for full value and a 12- tick.
content.location: Center left route on the steep triangle anchors below final bulge

content.description: This route offers steep, 12- climbing up to the bulge. Lower off fixed draw from here for a good warm up (we call this Star Ariel and it is a shortened version of the original route) or continue through the crux boulder problem above for 4 more bolts. Perma draws on the first ten bolts to make this route easier to clean.12c? Bolted by Terry Twomy
content.location: Center of the large steep triangle. Right side of the tip

content.description: This is the shortened version of "star tiger" great route that starts right center on the large triangle. Technical start leads to Jugs with the crux near the top. Climbs up and stops beneath the bulge. 12-
content.location: Right center on the large steep triangle. Goes right at the tip

content.description: Big pocket throws on the shortest line on the Triangle. A bit sharp, but pumpy and fun!
content.location: Far left route on the Bermuda Triangle

content.description: Fun route that starts on the right side of the overhanging triangle. Pumpy climbing to a reachy crux with good holds. Awesome chert to finish the route
content.protection: 10 bolts to chains. Permadraws to clip and lowers.
content.location: Right side of the triangle, climbs through the largest hueco on the wall.

content.description: I think of this route as 4 boulder problems separated by jug rest's. Good holds to shake out on but hard sections and long moves between them. Tricky and intricate holds through the crux.
content.protection: 9 bolts, stick clip the first if you want, it's kinda high. Permadraws to clip and lowers.
content.location: Second route on the left side of the steep triangle. Traverse up and right to the left side of the tip
